person: column person_id changing type from "INT" to "NVARCHAR(255)" may be unsafe
person: column name changing type from "VARCHAR(255)" to "TEXT" may be unsafe
person: column email changing type from "TEXT" to "VARCHAR(255)" may be unsafe
person: column bio changing type from "VARCHAR(1000)" to "VARCHAR(255)" may be unsafe
person: column notes changing type from "VARCHAR(255)" to "VARCHAR(1000)" may be unsafe
person: column height_meters changing type from "NUMERIC(3,1)" to "NUMERIC(3,2)" may be unsafe
person: column weight_kilos changing type from "NUMERIC(5,2)" to "NUMERIC(3,2)" may be unsafe
person: column salary_dollars changing type from "DECIMAL(5,2)" to "DECIMAL(10,2)" may be unsafe
person: column ip_address changing type from "VARCHAR(15)" to "VARCHAR(45)" may be unsafe
